entries.name: niso-credit:Conceptualization
entries.description: Ideas; formulation or evolution of overarching research goals and aims.

entries.name: niso-credit:DataCuration
entries.description: Management activities to annotate (produce metadata), scrub data and maintain research data for initial use and later re-use.

entries.name: niso-credit:FormalAnalysis
entries.description: Application of statistical, mathematical, computational, or other formal techniques to analyze or synthesize study data.

entries.name: niso-credit:FundingAcquisition
entries.description: Acquisition of the financial support for the project leading to this publication.

entries.name: niso-credit:Investigation
entries.description: Conducting a research and investigation process, specifically performing the experiments, or data/evidence collection.

entries.name: niso-credit:Methodology
entries.description: Development or design of methodology; creation of models.

entries.name: niso-credit:ProjectAdministration
entries.description: Management and coordination responsibility for the research activity planning and execution.

entries.name: niso-credit:Resources
entries.description: Provision of study materials, reagents, materials, patients, laboratory samples, animals, instrumentation, computing resources, or other analysis tools.

entries.name: niso-credit:Software
entries.description: Programming, software development; designing computer programs; implementation of the computer code and supporting algorithms; testing of existing code components.

entries.name: niso-credit:Supervision
entries.description: Oversight and leadership responsibility for the research activity planning and execution, including mentorship external to the core team.

entries.name: niso-credit:Validation
entries.description: Verification, whether as a part of the activity or separate, of the overall replication/reproducibility of results/experiments and other research outputs.

entries.name: niso-credit:Visualization
entries.description: Preparation, creation and/or presentation of the published work, specifically visualization/data presentation.

entries.name: niso-credit:WritingOriginalDraft
entries.description: Preparation, creation and/or presentation of the published work, specifically writing the initial draft (including substantive translation).

entries.name: niso-credit:WritingReviewEditing
entries.description: Preparation, creation and/or presentation of the published work by those from the original research group, specifically critical review, commentary or revision, including pre- or post-publication stages.
